application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required by condition 3 (submission of (a) detailed plans and elevation drawings (scale 1:10 / 1:20 as appropriate) of the proposed railings, the proposed post(s) and the existing (reinstated) gate in relation to the existing building(s) and boundary treatment, including details of the proposed fixings to the stone, the front facade and the adjacent features; (b) detailed drawings (scale 1:5) of the proposed finials; (c) a detailed method statement relating to the proposed fabric removal and reinstatement works) of planning permission 21/06640 (Replacement metal railings, repair support for front gate and damage to stone and render of buildings following impact damage at 25 Norland Square.)   ***WITHDRAWN***
